AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pit fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a form of entertainment amongst mercenaries, android captives would be pitted together to fight in a makeshift arena aboard their ship. Those who survived grew quite popular aboard the ship, {PAWN_nameDef} was one of those androids, dubbed "The mantis" for their ability to dodge hits with ease and the custom implants the crew put on them.
